name: Power Up Chocolate Protein Brownies
description: Power up with these epic brownies when you need to satisfy a craving! They’re vegan; low sugar; and egg, gluten, and peanut free, so they’ll work for almost everyone. And, they’re packed with 4 grams of protein, so you’re getting the most out of your sweets—protein slows the absorption of glucose to help you avoid a sugar spike (and crash!). Serve with a dollop of prepared Summer Berry Sweet Dip for a little extra sweetness.
preparation: Preheat oven to 350˚ F. Lightly oil an 8" square pan.
Using Ground Meat Separator, mash bananas into a large bowl. Add almond butter, cocoa powder, and protein powder; mix until smooth. Fold in chocolate chips, if using.
Scrape batter into pan and smooth top. Bake 32 min, or until a toothpick inserted into the centre comes out clean. Cool in pan before serving.

products.name: Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend (Pouch)
summary: We like to fuel our bodies and satisfy those chocolate cravings at the same time. Made with pea and fava bean protein, this blend turns into a velvety shake (just mix with water or milk) or morning smoothie with a luscious creamy texture, not chalky like a lot of other protein powders. It’s made with heat-stable probiotics which means baking with benefits! Add to pancake, waffle, muffin, or cookie batters. Power up your morning with an extra boost from 20 g of plant-based protein and essential amino acids.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
